title: Functional Requirements
body_html:
Functional Requirements

Event Coverage

  • Issues: created, updated, deleted, status_changed, assigned, priority_changed
  • Projects: created, updated, archived
  • Comments/Attachments: created/added

Webhook Management

  • Create, list, update, delete webhooks per workspace/space
  • Configure events, filters (project/status/etc.), headers
  • Enable/disable webhooks
  • Test delivery endpoint

Delivery

  • POST JSON payloads with HMAC-SHA256 signature (optional)
  • Configurable timeout and retry attempts
  • Exponential backoff and dead-letter recording

Observability

  • Delivery attempts history
  • Metrics (success rate, latency)
  • Health/status endpoints

Permissions

  • Only authorized users can manage webhooks
  • Webhook processing respects workspace/space segregation
